title: riot, did u change anything else apart from the client?
body:
Because since your 'client update' i suddenly get a lot of games where my connection from your server suddenly drops, causing in a soft leaver ban, which i do not like having randomly btw.

Before your client update i NEVER had connection issues, and since the update it has happened 4 times already.

No i did not change from internet provider.
No i did not change from what pc i play on.
No, when i do pingtests i don't get anything out of the usual.

Can you please give me a reason for this?

By the way i play on euw of course, but as we get straightforwardly 100% ignored there i'm gonna try my luck here.

replies.body:
The new client doesn't really change anything after you've reached in-game. I've been seeing some routing issues with Telia lately, which is a big backbone provider that a lot of EU ISPs partner with to bring your connection to our servers. Before we look into your route, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your ability to stay connected to games.
